TopicTitle: Space Vehicles used for the [KSP Forum Plays: KSP] Thread

Articles.Content:
Hey all! I'm making this thread as a sort of archive to the different vehicles I use for the thread KSP Forum Plays: KSP. I've decided that, since this experience of doing crazy missions on limited resources is a definite first for me, I would share my crafts for inspiration and a further example of my own insanity in the face of instructions by you, the KSP forum!

The Bare-Bones Minmus Lander

This was the first tough mission in the whole thread, and I was instructed to perform a Minmus landing on only two nodes of the tech tree. Scary, isn't it? But here's what I came up with!

Javascript is disabled. View full album

-more coming soon-
